Text: TPB has removed the steam-client link. You can easily google it though.
Sorry guys, I messed up while uploading the first release. Get the version 2 here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7876312

I found out why i messed up this torrent, it's because i saved the .torrent file inside the folder, and then moved it elsewhere after uploading it. That's why the torrent gets stuck at 90.3%, even though the exe file downloads fully. :D

Anyways, the required file has been succesfully uploaded on both this & the v2 torrent. Hope you guys enjoy it!
